```coq
Proof.
  intros net net' failed failed' tr HnoDup Hstep.
  unfold step_ordered_dynamic_failure in Hstep.
  inversion Hstep as [| |].
  - inversion H1 as [|n Hn Htr].
    apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_start in Htr.
    unfold deserialize_odnet in Htr.
    simpl in Htr.
    inversion Htr as [| |].
    + rewrite H1 in H.
      apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_start in H.
      simpl in H.
      auto.
    + inversion H1 as [| |].
      * apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_fail in H.
        simpl in H.
        auto.
      * apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_deliver in H.
        simpl in H.
        auto.
  - inversion H1 as [| |].
    + apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_fail in H.
      simpl in H.
      auto.
    + apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_deliver in H.
      simpl in H.
      auto.
Qed.
